full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 304 Filed 06/25/21 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

United States of America,

-v-

Ghislaine Maxwell,

Defendant.

ALISON J. NATHAN, District Judge:

The Court grants the Defendant's request that going forward the Government shall only file updates if there are any material changes to Ms. Maxwell's conditions of confinement. See Dkt. No. 300 at 1. In the absence of any other specific or supported application for relief from the Defendant, the Court will take no further action at this time.

SO ORDERED.

Dated: June 25, 2021
New York, New York

ALISON J. NATHAN
United States District Judge

USDC SDNY
DOCUMENT
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
DOC #:
DATE FILED: 6/25/21

DOJ-OGR-00004782
